allowance(address,address).details: Note: this binary allowance is unlike most other ERC20 tokensNote: this allowance allows spender to manage *all* the owner's assets

params.owner: The address of the account which owns the tokens to be spent
params.spender: The address of the account which may transfer tokens

returns._0: Either uint.max (spender is allowed) or zero (spender is disallowed)

approve(address,uint256).details: Note: this binary approval is unlike most other ERC20 tokensNote: this grants full approval for spender to manage *all* the owner's assets

params.amount: Either uint.max (to allow) or zero (to disallow)
params.spender: The address of the account which may transfer tokens

returns._0: Whether or not the approval change succeeded

params.asset: The collateral asset to check the balance for
